label: 本朝世紀
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
見出し読み: ほんちょう せいき
説明文: A chronicle of Japan from Emperor Uda to Horikawa, written during the 1150s by Fujiwara no Michinori (1106?-1159). Several sections are missing today, but the chronicle contains some reliable information from events during the insei era.
